description: Pipeline for parsing custom_gclog log logs

patterns: %{TIMESTAMP_ISO8601:gclog.log.timestamp}: %{NUMBER:gclog.log.jvmuptime}: \[(?<gclog.log.type>[^(]*) \((?<gclog.log.reason>[^)]*)\) %{TIMESTAMP_ISO8601}: %{NUMBER}:(?: \[%{WORD} \((?<gclog.log.cms_failed_reason>[^)]*)\): %{NUMBER}K->%{NUMBER}K\(%{NUMBER}K\), %{NUMBER} secs\]%{TIMESTAMP_ISO8601}: %{NUMBER}:)? \[(?<gclog.log.pattern>[A-Za-z]*)(?:%{TIMESTAMP_ISO8601}: %{NUMBER}:[^(]*\((?<gclog.log.cms_failed_reason>[^)]*)\))?: %{NUMBER:gclog.log.young_used_before_gc}K->%{NUMBER:gclog.log.young_used_after_gc}K\(%{NUMBER:gclog.log.young_size}K\), %{NUMBER} secs\] %{NUMBER:gclog.log.heap_used_before_gc}K->%{NUMBER:gclog.log.heap_used_after_gc}K\(%{NUMBER:gclog.log.heap_size}K\), (?:\[Metaspace: %{NUMBER:gclog.log.metaspace_used_before_gc}K->%{NUMBER:gclog.log.metaspace_used_after_gc}K\(%{NUMBER:gclog.log.metaspace_size}K\)\], )?%{NUMBER} secs\] \[Times: user=%{NUMBER:gclog.log.usertime} sys=%{NUMBER:gclog.log.systime}, real=%{NUMBER:gclog.log.realtime} secs\].*
